Package alix.lucene.search

Class TermList

java.lang.Object
alix.lucene.search.TermList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Term>
public class TermList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Term>
An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice. A hack allow to separate different rows, by a null entry. Different sort can change the order
  • sortByPos (restore input order)
  • sortByRowFreq (by frequency of rows, useful for a legend in a curve plot)
  • sortByString (keep row order, sort term alphabetically)
Author:
fred
